date_start.label: Start Date
date_start.tooltip: Enter or select the starting date for your graph in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

date_end.label: End Date
date_end.tooltip: Enter or select the ending date for your graph in the format (yyyy-mm-dd)

station1.label: Station 1
station1.tooltip: Enter an NDBC station ID (i.e. 44025) to display initially.

param1.label: Select a Buoy
param1.tooltip: Select an NDBC buoy from the options provided.

station2.label: Station 2
station2.tooltip: Enter an NDBC station ID (i.e. 44025) to display initially.

param2.label: Select a Buoy
param2.tooltip: Select an NDBC buoy from the options provided.
